---

The grain of this simple wooden wand forms shifting images of sharp claws, snapping jaws, and countless creatures.

<document level="2" id="action-1827" />

**Craft Requirements** Supply a casting of a spell of the appropriate level. The spell must have a casting time of <actions string="Single Action" /> or <actions string="Two Actions" />, must have the [polymorph](/Traits.aspx?ID=127) trait, and must allow more than one choice of battle form.
